documents.title: Projects Division Overview
documents.content: Prime Source Global (PSG) – Projects Division is located at Muslim St, Badr District, Dammam – 32265. Contact details: Mobile +966 508218146, Landline +966 13 804 4484, Email ceo@psgbiz.com.

documents.title: Vision and Core Values
documents.content:
VISION: To pursue excellence in all operations by improving safety, quality standards, and procedures, and by developing competitive people who deliver world-class service to clients.

CORE VALUES:
- Excellence: Innovation and quality using advanced technologies
- Teamwork: Mutual respect and cooperation
- Integrity: Honesty, reliability, and fairness
- Commitment: Efficient use of resources to achieve objectives
- Sustainability: Protecting stakeholders, especially HSE
- Accountability: Responsibility aligned with company values
- Customer Satisfaction: Delivered within agreed timelines and limits

documents.title: HSE (Safety) Policy
documents.content:
HSE (Safety) Policy: Complies with Occupational Safety & Health Administration standards. Employee safety is the company’s top responsibility. Safety, health, and environment are prioritized before business decisions. Injury and illness prevention takes priority over productivity.

Includes: Safety engineering controls, Employee training, Risk assessments, Safety audits.

Mandatory compliance for: Employees, Subcontractors, Vendors, External partners.

Statement: HSE is Priority for the Company to maintain Quality Services.

documents.title: Quality Policy
documents.content: Quality Policy: Meets all regulatory and legal quality requirements. Exceeds customer expectations. Continuous review through management meetings. Adequate resources for Quality Management System. Encourages pride, workmanship, and teamwork.

documents.title: Business Divisions
documents.content: Business Divisions: Civil Division, Mechanical Division, Electrical & Instrumentation (E&I) Division, General Maintenance.

documents.title: Civil Division Services & Capabilities
documents.content:
Civil Division Services: Civil & Structural Construction, Site Development & Earthwork, Temporary Facilities (Porta cabins, fencing, camps), Turnkey Projects, Duct banks, concrete foundations, culverts, Interior fit-out works, Road construction, Dewatering, shoring & sheet piling, Concrete rehabilitation & repair, HDPE / GEO membrane lining, Industrial coating & lining.

Civil Work Capabilities: Civil structure works, Dewatering & shoring works, Concrete rehabilitation (Corrosion survey, Solution design, Execution, Protection).

documents.title: Roads Construction
documents.content: Roads Construction: Right of Way (Access Roads). Clients include: Saudi Aramco, SABIC, RC, SEC. Equipped with modern road construction technology and manpower.

documents.title: Mechanical Division
documents.content:
Mechanical Division:
Dewatering & Shoring: Temporary water removal before excavation, Vertical / angled / horizontal shoring systems, Sheet piling works, Grouting & pile drilling.

Mechanical & Pipeline Works: Fabrication, erection & welding of metallic pipelines, Installation of non-metallic pipelines, Pipe supports & steel structures, Pipe spool repair/replacement, Hydrotesting of pipelines, Structural buildings.

documents.title: Maintenance Pipeline Work
documents.content: Maintenance Pipeline Work: Site inspection & technical solutions, Dewatering & shoring deployment, Expert execution as per procedures, Testing, HSE & QA support.

documents.title: Electrical & Instrumentation (E&I) Division
documents.content:
Electrical & Instrumentation (E&I) Division: SCADA system installation & pre-commissioning, Cable laying, pulling, termination & testing, Grounding grid installation & testing, Cathodic protection (CP), Solar panel & lighting system installation, Panel termination.

Major Clients: SATORP, SIEMENS (BI-10-10007), SA KENTZ.

documents.title: Rental Equipments
documents.content: Rental Equipments: Cranes, Boom lifts, Forklifts, Rollers, Loaders, Trucks, Excavators, Construction machinery.

documents.title: About Us - General
documents.content: At Prime Source Global, we are committed to pioneering solutions globally across diverse sectors, including trading, travel and tourism, eHealth, environmental consulting, and software development. Our mission is to drive innovation and excellence, delivering exceptional value while prioritizing sustainability and community impact. Through our collaborative approach, we create tailored solutions that cater to our clients’ unique needs, ensuring they thrive in today’s dynamic landscape. Our diverse team of experts works diligently to address the challenges of each industry we serve. From enhancing healthcare accessibility through eHealth solutions to promoting responsible practices in environmental consulting, we strive to make a meaningful difference. At Prime Source Global, we believe in the power of integrity and accountability, and we are passionate about shaping a better future through our pioneering efforts and unwavering commitment to quality.

documents.title: Sectors
documents.content:
Sectors: Agriculture & Food, (Bio) Chemicals, Rubber & Plastics, Construction, Electrical & Electronics, Forestry & Forest Products, IT, Machinery & Equipment, Medical Devices, Oil, Gas, Minerals & Metals, Public Sector, Pharma & Personal Care, Service, Tourism & Hospitality, Transportation.

PSG started its journey with minds from across the world. Whether it's a small piece of wood from far east Papua New Guinea or a large IT solution from the States, PSG has it all served under one roof.

documents.content:

documents.title: HVAC Systems Services
documents.content:
HVAC SYSTEMS
Valves & Flow Control: Gate Valves, Butterfly Valves, Ball Valves, Check Valves, Strainers.
Advanced HVAC Components: Flexible Joints, Double Regulating Valves, PICV, Differential Pressure Control Valves.
HVAC Automation & Monitoring: FCU Valve Packages, Solenoid Valves, Intelligent Control Valves.
HVAC Equipment: Air Vents, BTU Meters, Water Leak Detection Systems, Exhaust & Fresh Air Fans, Fire Dampers, Air Distribution Products, Thermal & Acoustic Insulation, Pumps (Centrifugal, Fire Pumps, Hydro Pumps).

documents.title: Electrical Systems Services
documents.content:
ELECTRICAL SYSTEMS
Variable Frequency Drives (VFD): Low / Medium Voltage, 0.37kW – 400kW.
UPS Systems: Online / Offline / Line Interactive, Backup 5–60 minutes.
Electrical Cables: Power, Control, Fire-Resistant, Solar.
Circuit Breakers: MCB, MCCB, ACB, ELCB.

documents.title: Plumbing Systems Services
documents.content:
PLUMBING SYSTEMS
PVC Pipes & Fittings: 20mm – 400mm.
CPVC Pipes: Hot & Cold Water, Up to 93°C.
UPVC Pipes: High UV Resistance, Drainage, Water Plumbing.
PPR Pipes: Welded joints, Up to 95°C.

documents.title: Fire Fighting Systems Services
documents.content:
FIRE FIGHTING SYSTEMS
Fire Fighting Valves: Hose Valves, Hydrant Valves, Deluge Valves.
Fire Hydrant Systems: Wet Barrel / Dry Barrel.
Fire Sprinkler Systems: Upright, Pendant, Sidewall, Concealed.
Gas Suppression Systems: CO2 Systems, NOVEC 1230 Systems.
Fire Alarm Systems: Addressable & Conventional, Smoke, Heat, Flame Detectors.
Fire Fighting Pumps: Diesel, Electric, Jockey Pumps.
